title: Pat Toomey
added: On January 9, 2021, Toomey said he thought Trump had performed an impeachable offense for his role in the [[2021 storming of the United States Capitol]], but he did not say if he would vote to impeach in the Senate.<ref>{{cite news |title=Top Republican says Trump committed 'impeachable offenses' |url=https://apnews.com/article/donald-trump-ap-top-news-impeachments-pat-toomey-1cfc09ef14e98c25db29fa74eb638547 |access-date=January 9, 2021 |work=AP NEWS |date=10 January 2021}}</ref>
